original_text:
The lips of the righteous know what is acceptable,
    but the mouth of the wicked, what is perverse.
korean_text: 의인의 입술은 기쁘게 할 것을 알거늘 악인의 입은 패역을 말하느니라

sentences.original_text: The lips of the righteous know what is acceptable
but the mouth of the wicked, what is perverse
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 악인의 입은 무엇이 패역한지 압니다
